Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto Omulindi wanje ni Nyasaye oweshia eshitabu, naye niye olindanga abakholanga amalayi
Nebalia abamulamanga balali Nyasaye shibanyala okhubahabina nohomba okhwihabina abeene tawe
Ne nobalaanga khubulunjifu shibawulila tawe, ne olabalola bakhuhenganga halali shibalolanga tawe
Tilana nende obulesheli, ne alomesie amalayi, ne olekhane nende abasilu
Ne eshibeyibeyi shia shetani nishikhunyasia, wilinde khu Nyasaye - (boola; Audhu billahi)- . Toto ye niye omuwulili omumanyi muno
Balia abaritsanga Nyasaye olwa shetani obafulukunyanga, betsulilanga mana balola injila
Ne Abasiani babu (shetani) , babakhweselanga mubukori mana bo shibachong’anga tawe

Nenolabarereraeshimanyisioshiabenya nibaboola mbu; “shiwakhashikasiye butswa eweomwene?” Boolambu’“esieenoondanga kefimbulilwe okhurula khu Nyasaye wanje. Bino ni ebimanyisio birulanga khu Nyasaye wenyu ne ni obulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi khubandu basuubilanga.”
Ne Ikurani nisomwa murechelesie ne muwulele mwakhaba murio mwanyoola tsimbambaasi
Ne Murumbule Nyasaye wuwo mumwoyo kwao mubwihotselefu nende muburii, ne olakhupa oluyoka mumakhuwa tawe, itsuli nende ing’olobe, ne olaba mubalia abang’ang’aala tawe
Balia abali ewa Nyasaye wuwo(nabo ni Malaika) shibali abafuru okhumukholela ibada yiyie tawe, ne bamwitsominjia ne bamwinamilanga
